title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.3 - Validation of continued number plates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 17.3 - Validation of continued number plates

State Regulations

Except as otherwise provided herein, number plates which
are continued for succeeding registration periods, including dealer and
transporter number plates, shall be validated for the original registration
period and for succeeding registration periods by a separate validating sticker
showing the month and year of expiration for each such registration period. Upon renewal of a registration, validation sticker and number plates for such
renewal periods may be affixed during the month preceding the date of
expiration of the registration being renewed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
17.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
